text: Jab tum maal-e-ganimat hasil karne ke liye jane lagoge to yeh pichey chodey jane waley log tumse zaroor kahenge ke humein bhi apne saath chalne do. Yeh chahte hain ke Allah ke farmaan ko badal dein. Inse saaf keh dena ke “Tum hargiz hamare saath nahin chal sakte. Allah pehle hi yeh farma chuka hai” yeh kahenge ke “nahin, balke tumlog humse hasad kar rahey ho” (halanke baat hasad ki nahin hai) balke yeh log sahih baat ko kam hi samajhte hain
